snippet.title: Wonder Wandelier 1st Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
"You're an apprentice wand maker with a dream - and a huge debt to pay off in 30 days! Manage your store, gather materials, and craft magic wands to sell to customers. Haggle to get the best price for your wares and build reputation as a wand maker in this casual magic wand-shop simulation RPG!"

Wonder Wandelier is an item shop simulator game with dungeon exploration and crafting element inspired by the legendary shopkeeping sim, Recettear. Work hard to collect money and become a successful magic wand entrepreneur!

Platform: PC, consoles (TBA)

Wishlist NOW on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2376570/Wonder_Wandelier/
